inviteMsg1: Hey there! If you're seeing this, it means you want to add the bot to your server. Before we do that, there are a couple things you need to know about the bot. If you do not follow these steps, the bot won't work for you, and will error for me! We don't want that, do we?
First, you must create a couple roles, these being Moderator and Administrator, and these roles are CaSe SeNsItIvE. That enables the permissions system to work.
Next, you need to make a channel named 'mod-logs'. This is where all of the logs for bans, kicks, warnings and mutes go.
inviteMsg2: Then, you need to invite the bot! Here's an invite link. https://discordapp.com/api/oauth2/authorize?client_id=419663814645252096&permissions=907406422&scope=bot
Once you've done that, do `!help` to see all the commands that the bot has for you.
inviteMsg3: I'm coded by Scottmg_YT#2966 in the discord.js library.
I started as being coded for a single server.
